content: शरणं [शॄ-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Protection, help, succour, defence; भूत्वा शरण्या शरणार्थमन्यं कथं प्रपत्त्ये त्वयि दीप्यमाने <ls>R. 14. 64</ls>, <ls>V. 1. 3</ls>; <ls>U. 4. 23.</ls> {@--2@} Refuge, shelter; <ls>Ku. 3. 8</ls>; <ls>Pt. 2.</ls> {@--3@} A place of refuge, resort, asylum (applied to persons also); स सुरासुरस्य जगतः शरणं <ls>Ki. 18. 22</ls>; संतप्तानां त्वमसि शरणं <ls>Me. 7</ls>; शरणं गमइ-या &c. ‘to go to for protection, take shelter with, to submit to’; यामि ह कमिह शरणं <ls>Gīt. 7.</ls> {@--4@} A sanctuary, closet, an apartment; अग्निशरणमार्गमादंशय <ls>Ś. 5.</ls> {@--5@} An abode, a house, habitation; <ls>Mu. 3. 15</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 9.</ls> {@--6@} Lair, restingplace. {@--7@} Injuring, killing.
